member.name: T:CMS.StrandsRecommender.Web.UI.StrandsRecommenderWebUIModule
member.summary: Represents StrandsRecommender Web UI module. This module handles integration with the Strands Recommender (http://recommender.strands.com/) and provides online store administrator the ability to enhance sales by automatically his recommending products to his customers.

member.name: M:CMS.StrandsRecommender.Web.UI.StrandsRecommenderWebUIModule.#ctor
member.summary: Default constructor.

member.name: M:CMS.StrandsRecommender.Web.UI.StrandsRecommenderWebUIModule.OnInit
member.summary: Handles the module initialization.

member.name: T:CMS.StrandsRecommender.Web.UI.StrandsRecommenderWebUIHandlers
member.summary: Contains handlers of the Strands recommendation Web UI module.

member.name: M:CMS.StrandsRecommender.Web.UI.StrandsRecommenderWebUIHandlers.Init
member.summary: Connects handlers to events.

member.name: M:CMS.StrandsRecommender.Web.UI.StrandsRecommenderWebUIHandlers.BindStrandsToPagePreRender(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Bind RenderStrandsScripts method to page prerender event.

member.name: T:CMS.StrandsRecommender.Web.UI.StrandsScriptGenerator
member.summary: This class is able to generate JavaScript snippets which are required to be rendered on page in order to enable integration with Strands Recommender.

member.name: M:CMS.StrandsRecommender.Web.UI.StrandsScriptGenerator.GetVisitedTrackingScript(System.String)
member.summary: Returns script which logs "visited" event to the Strands Recommender.
member.param: ID of the catalog item which is being visited. Must correspond to the IDs send through catalog feed

member.name: M:CMS.StrandsRecommender.Web.UI.StrandsScriptGenerator.GetSearchedTrackingScript(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Returns script which logs "searched" event to the Strands Recommender.
member.param: Text which was searched
ID of the catalog item which is being visited. Must correspond to the IDs send through catalog feed

member.name: M:CMS.StrandsRecommender.Web.UI.StrandsScriptGenerator.GetUserLoggedTrackingScript(System.String)
member.summary: Returns script which logs "userlogged" event to the Strands Recommender. This script indicates which user is browsing the web. This event needs to be logged at every page user visits (see http://recommender.strands.com/developers/javascript/#ulogin"/). Strands can later associate this user ID with the ID of the newsletter recipient and show appropriate recommendations.
member.param: ID of the user (needs to be the same as ID which is placed at the newsletter email with recommendation)

member.name: M:CMS.StrandsRecommender.Web.UI.StrandsScriptGenerator.GetUpdateShoppingCartTrackingScript(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String})
member.summary: Returns script which logs "updateschoppingcart" event to the Strands Recommender.
member.param: IDs of all items in shopping cart

member.name: M:CMS.StrandsRecommender.Web.UI.StrandsScriptGenerator.GetPurchasedTrackingScript(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{CMS.StrandsRecommender.StrandsPurchasedEventData})
member.summary: Returns script which logs "purchased" event to the Strands Recommender.
member.param: ID of the order
Information about products which were purchased

member.name: M:CMS.StrandsRecommender.Web.UI.StrandsScriptGenerator.GetLibraryIncludeScript
member.summary: Returns script which includes Strands library file. Returned string contains html script tags.

member.name: M:CMS.StrandsRecommender.Web.UI.StrandsScriptGenerator.GetInitializationScript(System.String)
member.summary: Returns script which starts execution of the Strands library. Must be included after Strands library.
member.param: API ID of the connected Strands account

member.name: M:CMS.StrandsRecommender.Web.UI.StrandsScriptGenerator.GetCustomizedRendererScript(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Returns code which registers custom rendering function and declaration of the rendering function. jQuery templates library has to be included in order for this code to work.
member.param: Code of the transformation which will be used to render recommendation
ID of the Strands template which will be rendered using custom transformation (i.e. HOME-1)
Client ID of the element where transformation will be rendered

member.name: M:CMS.StrandsRecommender.Web.UI.StrandsScriptGenerator.GetCultureSettingsScript(System.String)
member.summary: Returns script which sets current culture, so correct item captions can be shown.
member.param: Culture code, e.g. en-US

member.name: M:CMS.StrandsRecommender.Web.UI.StrandsScriptGenerator.GetCurrencySettingsScript(System.String)
member.summary: Returns script which sets current currency, so correct prices can be shown.
member.param: Current currency, e.g. EUR

member.name: M:CMS.StrandsRecommender.Web.UI.StrandsScriptGenerator.GetStrandsPushScript(System.Object)
member.summary: Returns script which pushes data into StrandsTrack JavaScript array. This array is used to communicate with Strands library.
member.param: Parameters which will be pushed into array. This will be serialized to JavaScript

member.name: T:CMS.StrandsRecommender.Web.UI.StrandsScriptRenderer
member.summary: Class capable of rendering various JavaScripts needed by Strands recommendation engine.

member.name: M:CMS.StrandsRecommender.Web.UI.StrandsScriptRenderer.#ctor(System.Web.UI.Page,System.String)
member.summary: Constructs class with default Scripts Generator.
member.param: Scripts will be rendered on this page
API ID of the associated Strands account

member.name: M:CMS.StrandsRecommender.Web.UI.StrandsScriptRenderer.#ctor(System.Web.UI.Page,System.String,CMS.StrandsRecommender.Web.UI.StrandsScriptGenerator)
member.summary: Constructs class.
member.param: Scripts will be rendered on this page
API ID of the associated Strands account
This instance will be used to generate scripts rendered to the page

member.name: M:CMS.StrandsRecommender.Web.UI.StrandsScriptRenderer.RenderItemVisitedTrackingScript(System.String)
member.summary: Renders script for the item visited event tracking.
member.param: ID of the catalog item which is being visited. Must correspond to the IDs send through catalog feed

member.name: M:CMS.StrandsRecommender.Web.UI.StrandsScriptRenderer.RenderSearchedTrackingScript(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Renders script for the item searched event tracking.
member.param: Search text
ID of the catalog item which is being visited. Must correspond to the IDs send through catalog feed

member.name: M:CMS.StrandsRecommender.Web.UI.StrandsScriptRenderer.RenderUserLoggedTrackingScript(System.String)
member.summary: Renders event indicating which user is browsing the web. This event needs to be logged at every page user visits (see http://recommender.strands.com/developers/javascript/#ulogin"/). Strands can later associate this user ID with the ID of the newsletter recipient and show appropriate recommendations.
member.param: ID of the user (needs to be the same as ID which is placed at the newsletter email with recommendation)

member.name: M:CMS.StrandsRecommender.Web.UI.StrandsScriptRenderer.RenderUpdateShoppingCartTrackingScript(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String})
member.summary: Renders script for updateschoppingcart tracking event.
member.param: IDs of all items in shopping cart

member.name: M:CMS.StrandsRecommender.Web.UI.StrandsScriptRenderer.RenderPurchasedTrackingScript(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{CMS.StrandsRecommender.StrandsPurchasedEventData})
member.summary: Renders purchased script with informations about all purchased items.
member.param: ID of the order
Informations about items to render

member.name: M:CMS.StrandsRecommender.Web.UI.StrandsScriptRenderer.RenderLibraryScript
member.summary: Includes Strands library in the page and initializes it by calling SBS.Worker.go. This is needed to perform any other actions (event tracking or getting recommendations). Strands library and initialization call are rendered at the end of the page, so every other script (tracking, settings, etc.) is before it.

member.name: M:CMS.StrandsRecommender.Web.UI.StrandsScriptRenderer.RenderCustomizedRendererScript(CMS.PortalEngine.TransformationInfo,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Renders script from custom layout of recommendation template.
member.param: Transformation provided by webpart settings. JQuery type is required
ID of Strands template to be customized
Client ID of element, where the template should be placed. Should by ID of 'Strands div' by default

member.name: M:CMS.StrandsRecommender.Web.UI.StrandsScriptRenderer.RenderCultureScript(System.String)
member.summary: Includes information about current culture in the page. Strands is then able to show recommendations in given culture.
member.param: Culture code

member.name: M:CMS.StrandsRecommender.Web.UI.StrandsScriptRenderer.RenderCurrencyScript(System.String)
member.summary: Includes information about current currency in the page. Strands is then able to show recommendations with price in given currency.
member.param: currency code

member.name: M:CMS.StrandsRecommender.Web.UI.StrandsScriptRenderer.RenderSettingsScript(System.String)
member.summary: Renders Strands JS script to the beginning of the page.
member.remarks: This method can be used to render: - tracking scripts (such as user logged tracking event) - settings scripts (cview or pview) - custom rendering function.
member.param: Script which will be rendered

member.name: T:CMS.StrandsRecommender.Web.UI.StrandsTrackingScriptsManager
member.summary: Handles rendering Strands tracking scripts on the live site. This class is able to recognize which scripts shall be rendered and renders them if needed.

member.name: M:CMS.StrandsRecommender.Web.UI.StrandsTrackingScriptsManager.#ctor(System.Web.UI.Page,System.String)
member.summary: Constructs Strands scripts delayed renderer.
member.param: Scripts will be rendered to this page
API ID of the connected Strands account

member.name: M:CMS.StrandsRecommender.Web.UI.StrandsTrackingScriptsManager.RenderStrandsScripts
member.summary: Renders strands scripts for all supported Strands events. This method recognizes based on context which events shall be logged and renders appropriate scripts. This method must be called when the Session is ready (typically on the Page's PreRender event).

member.name: M:CMS.StrandsRecommender.Web.UI.StrandsTrackingScriptsManager.RenderUserLoggedScript(CMS.StrandsRecommender.Web.UI.StrandsScriptRenderer)
member.summary: Renders event indicating which user is browsing the web. This event needs to be logged at every page user visits (see http://recommender.strands.com/developers/javascript/#ulogin"/). Strands can later associate this user ID with the ID of the newsletter recipient and show appropriate recommendations. User logged event is rendered only if current contact is known.
member.param: Renderer

member.name: M:CMS.StrandsRecommender.Web.UI.StrandsTrackingScriptsManager.RenderItemVisitedScript(CMS.StrandsRecommender.Web.UI.StrandsScriptRenderer)
member.summary: Renders JavaScript which tracks event when user visits product.
member.param: Renderer

member.name: M:CMS.StrandsRecommender.Web.UI.StrandsTrackingScriptsManager.RenderItemSearchedScript(CMS.StrandsRecommender.Web.UI.StrandsScriptRenderer)
member.summary: Renders script tracking event when user opens product from the search results. Method finds out that user comes from search page by checking http referrer. If previous page was displaying search results, it had searchtext parameter in url.
member.param: Renderer

member.name: M:CMS.StrandsRecommender.Web.UI.StrandsTrackingScriptsManager.RenderPurchasedScript(CMS.StrandsRecommender.Web.UI.StrandsScriptRenderer)
member.summary: Tracks event when user places an order. All items in order are included as event parameters.
member.param: Renderer

member.name: M:CMS.StrandsRecommender.Web.UI.StrandsTrackingScriptsManager.RenderUpdateShoppingCartScript(CMS.StrandsRecommender.Web.UI.StrandsScriptRenderer)
member.summary: Render script tracking event when user updates his shopping cart (adds or removes a product).
member.param: Renderer

member.name: M:CMS.StrandsRecommender.Web.UI.StrandsTrackingScriptsManager.GetSKUNode(CMS.Ecommerce.SKUInfo,System.String)
member.summary: Gets the SKU node. If there are multiple nodes for this SKU the first occurrence is returned.
member.param: The SKU.
OrderBy columns. Default is NodeAlias column.
